messages.subject: Help Please
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I know I haven t posted in a while, I have tried to read the digest and keep up, but the edits on the book have taken up all of my spare time. Actually
messages.messageBody:
Hi all, I know I haven't posted in a while, I have tried to read the digest
and keep up, but the edits on the book have taken up all of my spare time.
Actually that is why I have come out of my cocoon. I need some quotes
regarding how your children learn different subjects. This is just being used
in a round up of ideas type of chapter. Please mail me off list if you would
like to share a few pearls of collective wisdom:)
Thanks!
Teri
unschoolr2
